DescribePack: DROPPED, CRACKED THE CAP AND WAS LEAKING CORROSIVE LIQUID INSIDE A WET SOILED BOX SOILING ALL CONTENTS INSIDE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PLACED INSIDE A HAZMAT BAG AND RED HAZMAT TOTE.
